amendment.description: To increase the voting threshold for budget points of order.

vote.text: Amendment SA 6561, under the order of 12/22/22, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 34 - 63. Record Vote Number: 409.

action.text: Amendment SA 6561 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Paul to Amendment SA 6552. (consideration: CR S10066; text: CR S10062) To increase the voting threshold for budget points of order.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 6561 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Paul to Amendment SA 6552.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 6561, under the order of 12/22/22, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 34 - 63. Record Vote Number: 409.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 6561, under the order of 12/22/22, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 34 - 63. Record Vote Number: 409.
